trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The seasoned hunter seeks a seasoned partner.
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_TODO_01<tab>Use the sack to gather the sleeping bhujamga and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the captured bhujamga and the slain bhujamga to the seasoned hunter.
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the seasoned hunter at Palaka's Stand.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_000<tab>Hmm. The stories paint you as ferocity incarnate, and by the sight of you I don't reckon they're too far from the truth. You mind lendin' me an onze of that ferocity to catch some prey?

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_001<tab>The healers from the village have tasked me with huntin' down a beast possessin' a right deadly venom. I'm at a loss as how to go about it─but with two strappin' hunters, I'm sure we'll find a way. So, are you with me?
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_002<tab>I look forward to seein' what you can do! Well then, our mark is to the north. I trust you'll keep up with me.
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_010<tab>You came. Good. I thought there was a slim possibility you'd lose heart and slink off, but I'm glad to be proven wrong.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_011<tab>I've set up three traps around the perimeter. Pieces of fresh meat mixed with medicine that'll dull the senses of any beast greedy enough to eat them. If they worked like I think they should, all you should have to do is scoop the bhujamga up in this sack.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_012<tab>Now, animals aren't known for sharin', so there's a chance one might try to take our prize. If one does, slay it and bring it to me. I'm sure I'll think of a way to use it.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_100_012<tab>I think I can leave the rest in your hands. I'm off to hunt a different prey─one with too many legs and an altogether unpleasant disposition. When we're both done with our tasks, let's meet back here. Best of luck.
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_020<tab>You've got a healthy look about you─I take it that means you avoided any run-ins with the venom, eh? Let me see what you caught.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_021<tab>...By the Twelve! You managed to <var 1A 02 /var>kill<var 1A 01 /var> one!? It takes three of us days of plannin' to achieve such a feat, yet you did it with nary a bead of sweat on your brow. The stories were true, indeed!
TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_022<tab>I'll take this to the healers straightaway. Find me again in the village and you'll have your well-deserved reward.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_030<tab>It's good to see you returned, friend. The healers were impressed with our work, but I made sure they knew it was <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who single-handedly slew that bhujamga.

TEXT_AKTKZF012_04267_HUNTER04267_000_031<tab>The healers use their venom to make a salve that numbs the skin─useful for when they need to cut the rot out or administer some other ghastly treatment. Anyroad, good work today─may the hunt be prosperous!
